title: The monomial expansion formula for Hall-Littlewood $P$-polynomials
abstract:
We give a Hecke algebra derivation of Macdonald's expansion formula for
Hall-Littlewood polynomials in terms of semistandard Young tableaux. This is
accomplished by first obtaining a Hecke algebra lift of the expansion
coefficients and then proving a generalization of Klostermann's recursions.
